reviewText: I have been put through Christian schools for almost my whole life.  There were upsides and downsides.  The upsides outweigh the downsides by far.  I know the Lord, and I am so grateful. Salvation is the most important thing for any person, and if you don't learn that then you will learn to live only for something less.  You will live for yourself.  We need to fight for the freedom to have Christian education.  Times are changing, and we need to know why it's important.  This CD gives the reasoning for the need.
How wonderful to hear these godly men address the topic of education. Chuck and Brian offer their insight into this subject in an intellectual way.

To pursue higher education that is Christ-based ... what can be better than that?  If you're at a crossroad, trying to decide which way to go for your academic pursuits, hear what Chuck Smith and Brian Nixon have to say on the topic.  Both of them love the Lord and are very smart!
